ovdesc.p: REG.PROGRAMS.SUMMARY is an LIVE template, which gives the complete details about the all the programs/routines avaliable in the System. It gives the details like Product, Program type, Total calls, Application from where the program is called from, Number of calls made in the program/routine and also gives the details about the program source called from. With the help of this application we can get the complete details about the programs/routines regressed in each Regression cycle.

desc.p: This field gives the details about the program from which the Source program is called from. (Source here refers the program defined in the ID of the record).

This field holds the count of number of times the program/routine is being called from the specified Product( i.e the Product defined in the ID of the record).This field value is the summation of multi value field NO.OF.CALLS
This field allows Numeric Input or Specified Input by Table
With the help of this field, we can identify the product to which the program/routine belong to.
This field allows Numeric Input or Specified Input by Table.

This field specifies the program type. The program/routine may fall under any of the following types. INBUILD ROUTINES, INSERT.FILES, ENQUIRY.ROUTINES, CONVERSION.ROUTINES, DAS.ROUTINES, TEST.ROUTINES, SELECT.ROUTINES, LOAD.ROUTINES or FILTER.ROUTINES.
This field allows Numeric Input or Specified Input by Table
This field specifies the Application name from which the routine is being called
This field holds the count of number of times the program/routine is called from each application.

It checks for the application (from where the program/routine is called from) in the record already stored in the REG.PROGRAMS.SUMMARY file, if applictaion found, then this field count will be incremented by one.
This field allows Numeric Input or Specified Input by Table
This is the unique ID to identify the record created under this file.Any alphanumeric characters are allowed.
The ID of the Regression Programs summary file is the combination of Product name and program/routine name
